name: Beef Burger
description: Enjoy our classic beef burger featuring a juicy, flavorful patty served on a warm, toasted bun. It's perfectly complemented by fresh lettuce, ripe tomato, and our signature savory sauce for a truly satisfying experience.

name: Margherita Pizza
description: A timeless favorite with a thin crust, rich tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella, and a sprinkle of fragrant basil leaves.

name: Fried Chicken
description: Golden, crispy fried chicken with a juicy interior, seasoned to perfection for that irresistible crunch in every bite.

name: Eton Mess
description: A delightful mix of crisp meringue, fresh strawberries, and whipped cream, creating a sweet and refreshing dessert.

name: Chicken Burger
description: Crispy fried chicken fillet layered with crisp lettuce, creamy mayo, and tangy pickles in a soft bun.

name: Caprese Salad
description: Fresh mozzarella, juicy tomatoes, and fragrant basil drizzled with extra virgin olive oil and balsamic glaze.
